room_title: Escape room "The Professor's Study" by Endeavor Escape Rooms in South Bend
review: Awesome escape room experience. Creative puzzles that were both fun and challenging. Most affordable option in the area of the three that offer escape rooms and by far the best in the area.

room_title: Escape room "The Professor's Study" by Endeavor Escape Rooms in South Bend
review: This room was cleverly constructed with interesting puzzles. I would highly recommend this place to anyone looking for a challenging escape room experience. Also, you can't beat the price of this place. Well worth the cost.

room_title: Escape room "The Professor's Study" by Endeavor Escape Rooms in South Bend
review: Can’t wait to come back for the second room once construction is finished! This escape room was wonderfully planned out with many levels to crack within each room. At a great price, you can’t beat it!

room_title: Escape room "The Professor's Study" by Endeavor Escape Rooms in South Bend
review: Well constructed and exciting problems to solve! Not impossible to complete in an hour. Garrett, the owner, is awesome, and I can't wait to see what other rooms he adds!

room_title: Escape room "The Professor's Study" by Endeavor Escape Rooms in South Bend
review: Had a GREAT time doing this with friends. If you're looking for an experience that will test your physical and mental abilities, as well as your patience, I highly recommend stopping by and giving this a try. Grab a few close friends and see if you've got what it takes to escape this mind boggling endeavor.
